function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of local services and amenities","Impact":"Decreased livability, reliance on external resources","Mitigation":"Development of local services, urban farming for self-sustainability","Technologies":"Online delivery platforms, urban farming technologies","People":"Local residents, community stakeholders","Owner":"Local government, property developers"},{"Description":"Dependence on external food supply","Impact":"Food shortages during quarantine measures","Mitigation":"Development of urban farming, food reserves","Technologies":"Urban farming technologies, irrigation systems","People":"Local residents, community stakeholders","Owner":"Property developers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of contagious diseases in high-density areas","Impact":"Rapid spread of pathogens, increased risk of transmission","Mitigation":"Urban farming, ventilation systems, sanitation measures","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, air circulation systems","People":"Local residents, building occupants","Owner":"Property developers, facility managers"}]}
